scripts.build-macros: macro-compiler src -t NodeJs target/node/src Browser target/browser/src
scripts.build-node: npm run build-macros && npm run build --prefix target/node
scripts.build-browser: npm run build-macros && npm run build --prefix target/browser
scripts.build: npm run build-macros && npm run build --prefix target/browser && npm run build --prefix target/node
